statement: I always mess everything up. I'm such a failure. Everyone probably thinks I'm incompetent.
I feel anxious about the presentation tomorrow. What if I forget everything?
Had a good day at work. Finished the project on time and got positive feedback.
I can't believe I made that mistake. Now everything is ruined. My career is over.
I should be better at this by now. I must work harder or I'll never succeed.
